http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: Non-religious Mennonites
teams.loan_because: We loan beause helping our ourselves and others is what Mennonites do, naturally.
teams.description: Mennonites have a history of doing good works simply because those works are good, not because we expect any repayment. However, most of that has een done through religious- and faith-based organizations like ones local congregation or organizations liek Mennonite Central Committee. This group is for ex-church Mennonites who wish to continue that tradition of social justice lending in a non-religious environment.

teams.name: 30 By 30
teams.loan_because: On October 24, 2011 Rachael turns 30.  Instead of 30 drinks, how about 30 loans? (You wouldn't want to leave the Birthday Girl lending alone, would you?)
teams.description:
We are smart, passionate and enterprising people who all had their arm twisted into making a loan in honor of Rachael's 30th birthday. It's the greatest birthday present ever: empower people, support Kiva, trumpet entrepreneurship, celebrate in style -- all things Rachael loves.  (Her liver doesn't mind this plan either...)

*Update:  Maybe we'll rename the group (More than) 30 by 30! There's still plenty of room to come and join the celebration!

Don't know Rachael?  Make a loan to celebrate! Just beware of her "getting to know you" questions. (You've been warned.)

teams.name: Kathleen Smith Memorial Fund
teams.loan_because: we help people help themselves.
teams.description:
Not only friends of Kathleen (Dec. 25, 1959 - Feb. 16, 2011) can join, but anyone from all over the world : Kathleen visited a lot of countries, she was speaking many languages from French to Russian. 
After she left the USA, she was staying in Paris, France, for 15 years.

She was a skilled biologist and was working to help fight cancer.

If you know people with cancer or carcinomatous meningitis, this is the team you were looking for : international, open and friendly.

Welcome !
--
Cette équipe est ouverte à tous. Kathleen  (25 dec. 1959 - 16 fév. 2011) avait visité de nombreux pays et parlait plusieurs langues, du français au russe.
Après avoir quitté les USA elle s'était installée à Paris depuis près de 15 ans.
Elle était une excellente chercheuse en Biologie, et participait à la lutte contre le cancer.
Si vous connaissez des gens atteint par cette maladie, ou souffrant d'une méningite carcinomateuse, cette équipe est pour vous : internationale, ouverte et amicale.
Bienvenue !

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: Episcopal Church in the United States
teams.loan_because: As Episcopalians, we are followers of Jesus Christ, our Lord, and believe in the Father, Son and Holy Spirit.  We strive to love our neighbors as ourselves and respect the dignity of every person.
teams.description: The Episcopal Church is part of the worldwide Anglican Communion, and traces its heritage to the beginnings of Christianity.  We celebrate our unity in Christ while honoring our differences, always putting the work of love before uniformity of opinion. We believe in amendment of life, the forgiveness of sin, and life everlasting.  All are welcome to find a spiritual home in the Episcopal Church.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: The Barefoot Investor
teams.loan_because: We believe everyone can tread their own path.

teams.name: Beer and Bibles
teams.loan_because: To share our blessings with those less fortunate and to help people who need it.
teams.description: We are a group of young people joined together (at least initially) through our membership and involvement with our Savior Lutheran Church in Carol Stream, Illinois, USA

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: Kalem Wright & Julia Wiles Wedding October 21 2011
teams.loan_because: Please celebrate our marriage by empowering people in the developing world to lift themselves out of poverty.
teams.description: Kalem and Julia are celebrating their marriage with KIVA!

teams.description:
People who live in Maine,
People who used to live in Maine,
People who work in Maine,
People who vacation in Maine,
People who love Maine and her people

teams.name: Team New England
teams.loan_because: we believe given the opportunity, every individual has within them the ability to make a difference. Our aim is to afford those opportunities to individuals looking to change their lives and in doing so better their community.
teams.description: We are New Englanders, located in the northeast corner of the United States. We hail from towns dotted along the Green Mountains of Vermont and the sandy coastlines of the Bay and Ocean States. The White Mountains and wilderness of (the free state) New Hampshire and the Gold Coast of Connecticut we call our home. The dense forests of Maine lend us the Pine Tree emblem affixed upon our flag proudly uniting the region for hundreds of years and today our cause for empowering people around the world. We welcome anyone who wishes to join us!

teams.name: Indonesia
teams.loan_because: We want to help others
teams.description: We lend for others,especially for Indonesian.

teams.name: Long Distance Bicyclists
teams.loan_because: We've enjoyed hospitality all over the world from people just like Kiva's entrepreneurs. Now we want to return the favor.
teams.description: Long distance cyclists like to see the world by bicycle. We quit our jobs, give up our homes, pack our panniers and pedal over mountains, along river valleys and through towns. We love to explore and meet people along the way.

teams.loan_because: Because God first lent us hope in Jesus Christ.
teams.description: We believe Jesus Christ came into this world both entirely as a righteous man and merciful God, who saved sinful people like you and me by paying the debts of their life's wrongdoings.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Textile Artists for Global Change
teams.loan_because: We have a common interest in moving toward positive change through textile art.
teams.description: A group of people inspired by Anna Hergert who are interested in textile art. We may have met in workshops or stay connected across distances through Anna's website and blog.

teams.name: EmpireAvenue
teams.loan_because:
Our goal is to help people and demonstrate the power of social networks!

Make a loan - we buy 7,400+ shares.
teams.description:
We hang out on a social network called Empire Avenue.

If you are on Empire Avenue and you make a loan, the team will collectively buy more than 7,400 shares in you -- a great incentive!

teams.name: Team Edgar
teams.loan_because: We believe in small entrepeneurs who need a little help to get started or grow.
